description: [SUNBURST](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0559) collected the registry value HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Cryptography\MachineGuid from compromised hosts.(Citation: FireEye SUNBURST Backdoor December 2020)

external_references.description: FireEye. (2020, December 13). Highly Evasive Attacker Leverages SolarWinds Supply Chain to Compromise Multiple Global Victims With SUNBURST Backdoor. Retrieved January 4, 2021.
